text: Ezɨ kɨ Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn itima me nan gari kɨ Godɨn damazimɨn zue. Gumazir avɨrim na ko itir puvatɨzɨ, nɨgɨnir avɨriba uaghan puvatɨ.24:18 Tertulus ves 6ɨn aven Pol akam a gasa ghaze, Pol Godɨn Dɨpenim damutɨ, a Godɨn damazimɨn mɨzegham. Ezɨ Pol akar kam ikarvaghasa, kamaghɨn mɨgei, a zuegha gɨvagha gɨn Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn aven zui.
